channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master Redemption
channel.desc: Unhappy Canvases return for a chance at a new tattoo and, unknown to them, their original artist awaits for a shot at redemption. In this episode, Tim Lees and ES face hostile canvases. (S1, ep1).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master Redemption
channel.desc: Mystical Mike and Don are back for redemption, but egos collide when they must tag team with a fan favourite. (S1, ep2).
